input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Active Half Zip'
  - Name='Pedal to Empower x Rapha Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Core Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Jersey long sleeve'
  - Name='Sportful Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Escape Supergiara Thermal Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Bodyfit Pro long sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Bodyfit Pro Short Sleeve Base Layer'
  - Name='Summit Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Men's Matchy Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Supergiara Logo Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Blurred Out Pro Hex Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Summit Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Entrata VI Sleeveless Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Women's Eclipse Pro Race Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Rocket Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Summit Women's Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Blazers Supporter Jersey'
  - Name='Range Cargo LS Jersey'
  - Name='Gore Wear Men's C3 Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Signal Cycling Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality cycling jersey focused on lightweight and performance, similar cycling use and construction, but long sleeve rather than unspecified sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight cycling jersey designed for performance, closely matching the core jersey in function and features though sleeve length isn't specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Active Half Zip
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling top with a half zip feature, likely performance-oriented but possibly more casual or activewear style; less direct match than full cycling jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal to Empower x Rapha Men's Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey from related brand, likely similar in function but possibly special edition or with different features; relevance is solid but uncertain in specific features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Core Lightweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly matches the reference product line in name, likely almost identical in purpose, construction, and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact product line name, very likely nearly identical cycling jersey in function, features, and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Classic Jersey long sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic style cycling jersey, long sleeve variation may differ in fabric weight and design but serves similar cycling function.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sportful's cycling jersey likely designed for performance and comfort, probably lightweight and durable, but ambiguous about sleeve length and materials.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal long sleeve jersey designed for colder conditions contrasts with lightweight and moisture-wicking focus of reference but still cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Bodyfit Pro long sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance-oriented cycling jersey with bodyfit construction, similar in purpose though long sleeve and possibly heavier material.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer differs from outer jersey; while related to cycling apparel, it serves a distinct function under the jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Named as a cycling jersey, but lacks explicit references to lightweight or advanced features; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Men's Matchy Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey designed for performance, similar function, potentially similar lightweight construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey by Sportful, likely performance oriented, but possibly heavier or longer sleeve based on line.
